card.name: Gamora
card.property: Finesse â€” Response: After you play an [[attack]] event, remove 1 threat from a scheme. (Limit once per phase.) Precision â€” Response: After you play an [[thwart]] event, deal 1 damage to an enemy. (Limit once per phase.)

alternate.name: Gamora
alternate.property: Skilled Tactician â€” You may include up to 6 [[attack]] and [[thwart]] events in your deck from aspects other than your own. Action: Look at the top card of your deck. If that card is an [[attack]] or [[thwart]] event, draw it. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Nebula
card.property: Response: After Nebula enters play, search your deck for an [[attack] or [[thwart]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"This will be a fast fight."

card.name: Acrobatic Move
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
"If you really knew me as well as you thought you did, you would not have attacked me." - Gamora

card.name: Crosscounter
card.property: Hero Interrupt (attack/defense/thwart): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Remove 1 threat from a scheme.
"That decision will be your last!" - Gamora

card.name: Set the Pace
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Decisive Blow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy (7 damage instead if you have played a [[thwart]] event this turn).
"Thanos built me for one purpose: to kill. He'll soon realize that was a poor decision." - Gamora

card.name: Forward Momentum
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (5 threat instead if you have played an [[attack]] event this turn).
"This isn't going to go well for you." - Gamora

card.name: Conditioning Room
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Conditioning Room â†’ return the bottommost [[attack]] or [[thwart]] event from your discard pile to your hand. Heal 1 damage from Gamora.
"I'm always prepared." - Gamora

card.name: Keen Instincts
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Keen Instincts â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an [[attack]] or [[thwart]] event.
"Take your chances with me. You won't regret it." - Gamora

card.name: Gamora's Sword
card.property: Restricted. Response: After you play an [[attack]] event, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Angela
card.property: Forced Response: After Angela enters play under your control, search the top 10 cards of the encounter deck for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck. If a minion was not put into play this way, discard Angela.

card.name: Clobber
card.property: Hero Action (Attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If this is the first card you have played this round, return this card to your hand.
"If I have to hit you again, you'll stay down. For good." - Gamora

card.name: Plan of Attack
card.property: Action: Search the top 4 cards of your deck (top 7 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form) for an [[attack]] event and add that card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"No, I have a plan. Attack." - Star-Lord

card.name: First Hit
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 2 damage to the villain. Hero Interrupt: When a minion initiates an attack, deal 2 damage to that minion.

card.name: Impede
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from the main scheme. If this is the first card you have played this round, return this card to your hand.
"First, you'll have to go through me." - Star-Lord

card.name: Godslayer
card.property: Restricted. Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack against a unique enemy, exhaust Godslayer â†’ your hero gets +2 ATK for that attack.

card.name: Drax
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Drax cannot attack minions.
"Behold, this battle has raised my spirits greatly!."

card.name: Hit and Run
card.property: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. Remove 2 threat from a scheme.
"You know, Lady Gamora, even when we first met-white I was beating you to death-I thought to myself, 'I bet she and I could be friends'" - Angela

card.name: Pivotal Moment
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 2 damage to the villain (5 damage instead if there is no threat on the main scheme).
"This isn't quite what I had in mind... but I'll take it!." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Comms Implant
card.property: Attach to a [[guardian]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gets +1 THW and +1 hit point.

card.name: True Grit
card.property: Response (thwart): After your hero defends against an enemy attack, remove threat from a scheme equal to your hero's THW.
"Just remember, I didn't start this!" - Luke Cage

card.name: Unfulfilled Destiny
card.property: Give to the Gamora player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Gamora â†’ remove Unfulfilled Destiny from the game. - Choose and discard 2 events from your hand. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Sibling Rivalry
card.property: Players other than Gamora cannot remove threat from Sibling Rivalry Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, deal 1 facedown encounter card to Gamora.
"One day, sister, our father will see that I am far more worthy than you." - Nebula

card.name: Nebula
card.property: Retaliate 2. Forced Interrupt: When this minion would enter play, discard the Nebula ally from play. (Gamora's nemesis minion.)

card.name: In A Bind
card.property: Attach to Gamora. Treat Gamora's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[traits]]). Hero Action: Choose and discard an [[attack]] event from your hand and deal 1 damage to Gamora â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Waylay
card.property: When Revealed: Stun and confusa Gamora. If Gamora is already stunned or confused, this card gains surge.
"You won'd be father's favorite for much longer, dear sister" - Nebula
